content: DSW 3018-E Wire saw High power (30 kW) electric wire saw for outstanding heavy-duty cutting performance ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond wire and wall saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features High sawing performance thanks to two powerful motors, each with 15 kW power output High starting torque reduces effort required to grind-in the wire Wire tension damping system reduces stress on the wire Steplessly variable cutting speed with visual indicator Easily adjustable guide pulley system for fast set-up Applications Controlled demolition or dismantling of structures Applications that must be completed within a very short time frame, demanding highest sawing performance Cutting heavily-reinforced concrete, masonry, stone or steel Underwater applications (where the sawing wire runs partly under water) Dry wire sawing applications (e.g. decommissioning of power plants) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Motor power: 30 kW Power source: Electric Min. generator power: 80 kVA Technical Data | Motor power | 30 kW | Power source | Electric | Min. generator power | 80 kVA | Wire storage capacity | 724.41 in | Weight | 1212.54 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 86.1 dB (A) | 1 | IP protection class | IP 65 (EN 60529), IP 54 (EN 60529) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2094616 - Wire saw DSW 3018-E 3x480V PR - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSW3018-E 3x480V kpl Wire saw - 2x Single-pair pulley DSW-SPP 30 PR - 1x Water supply, long for wire saw - 1x Water supply, flexible, for wire saw - 2x Hose 10m assy - 1x Protective cover DSW-WG 30 kit - 1x DSW-TS30 UL Tool set
